title: Ollama
summary: Ollama is the official CLI and library for running large language models locally with support for Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and others.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, providing easy integration in Node.js and browser environments.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, enabling programmatic interaction with local LLMs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, allowing use of Ollama-hosted models in LangChain workflows.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama, offering ChatGPT-like interface for local models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama, providing Java/Kotlin developers access to local LLMs.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipeline using Ollama and ChromaDB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot integration for Ollama, enabling local LLM chat within Discord servers.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI chat wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app for Ollama, offering a quick web interface for local LLM experimentation.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama-nvidia
summary: NVIDIA GPU optimized Docker images and scripts for Ollama with CUDA acceleration.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust client for Ollama with async support and ergonomic API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial Go client for Ollama, providing idiomatic Go APIs for local LLMs.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama, allowing teams to chat with local models in Slack channels.

title: ollama-datasets
summary: Curated datasets and fine-tuning scripts compatible with Ollama for domain-specific models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings Ollama-powered AI assistance into your notes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama, enabling local LLM usage in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-nextjs
summary: Next.js starter template with Ollama integration for building local LLM web apps.
